name: Degenerate Souls
description:
It's a tactical shooting survival game,

You will be dropped on an island. You need to pick up weapons or kill enemies to get weapons. You need to destroy all enemies on the island.

Content and game play

-Search for props

-Fighting the army

-Rich combat elements

-All kinds of weapons

-Explore the vast map

Game features:

-First person real and exciting game mode.

-The intense and exciting atmosphere of the game.
